TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Lupakatj, title = Lupakatj, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lupakatj} }

S.FORM: Lupakatj Itiniay i Taimali Cen no Taitung ko Lupakatj a niyaro', 220 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 484 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 52% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 250 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 48% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 234 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 48%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%, Puyuma 1%, roma 1%.

Lopakatj Itiniay i Taimali Cen no Taitong ko Lopakatj a niyaro', 220 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 484 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 52% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 250 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 48% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 234 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 48%, Amis 1%, Bonon 1%, Poyoma 1%, roma 1%.
